These words help show where someone or something is.
The cat is in the box.
The cat is in front of the mouse.
The cat is on the table.
The cat is behind the rabbit.
The cats are beside the dog.
The cat is next to the tablet.
The cat is on the left.
The cat is on the right.
The cat is under the bed.
The cat is above the dog.
The game is between the cats.
